SELECT MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.KAMOKU_NO , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.CATEGORY_NUMBER ,
MS_VESSEL_ITEM.ZAIKO_COUNT , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.BIKOU ,
MS_VESSEL_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.DATA_NO , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.USER_KEY , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.TS FROM MS_VESSEL_ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID

SELECT MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ITEM_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.KAMOKU_NO , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID , MS_TANI.TANI_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.CATEGORY_NUMBER ,
MS_VESSEL_ITEM.ZAIKO_COUNT , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.BIKOU ,
MS_VESSEL_ITEM.SEND_FLAG , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.VESSEL_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.DATA_NO , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.USER_KEY , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.RENEW_DATE , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM.TS FROM MS_VESSEL_ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_TANI ON MS_TANI.MS_TANI_ID = MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_TANI_ID
WHERE MS_VESSEL_ITEM.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID

INSERT INTO MS_VESSEL_ITEM( MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , VESSEL_ITEM_NAME , KAMOKU_NO , MS_TANI_ID , CATEGORY_NUMBER ,
ZAIKO_COUNT , BIKOU ,
SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID , :VESSEL_ITEM_NAME , :KAMOKU_NO , :MS_TANI_ID , :CATEGORY_NUMBER ,
:ZAIKO_COUNT , :BIKOU ,
:SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_VESSEL_ITEM SET VESSEL_ITEM_NAME = :VESSEL_ITEM_NAME , KAMOKU_NO = :KAMOKU_NO , MS_TANI_ID = :MS_TANI_ID , CATEGORY_NUMBER = :CATEGORY_NUMBER ,
ZAIKO_COUNT = :ZAIKO_COUNT , BIKOU = :BIKOU ,
SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS

WHERE MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
